metadata.title: CVE-2018-6520 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: SimpleSAMLphp before 1.15.2 allows remote attackers to bypass an open redirect protection mechanism via crafted authority data in a URL.

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.15.2-1').
